def get_qa_chain(llm, retriever):
    prompt = __get_prompt_template_base__()

    qa = RetrievalQA.from_chain_type(
        llm=llm,
        chain_type="stuff",
        retriever=retriever,
        return_source_documents=True,
        chain_type_kwargs={"prompt": prompt},
    )

    return qa
